verses.verse: And the children <WH1121> of Israel <WH3478> did <WH6213> evil <WH7451> again <WH3254> in the sight <WH5869> of the LORD; <WH3068> and the LORD <WH3068> delivered <WH5414> them into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430> forty <WH705> years. <WH8141>

And there was <WH1961> a certain <WH259> man <WH376> of Zorah, <WH4480> <WH6681> of the family <WH4480> <WH4940> of the Danites, <WH1839> whose name <WH8034> was Manoah; <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> was barren, <WH6135> and bore <WH3205> not. <WH3808>

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> appeared <WH7200> unto <WH413> the woman, <WH802> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> her, Behold <WH2009> now, <WH4994> thou <WH859> art barren, <WH6135> and bearest <WH3205> not: <WH3808> but thou shalt conceive, <WH2029> and bear <WH3205> a son. <WH1121>
Now <WH6258> therefore beware, <WH8104> I pray thee, <WH4994> and drink <WH8354> not <WH408> wine <WH3196> nor strong drink, <WH7941> and eat <WH398> not <WH408> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2931> thing:

For, <WH3588> lo, <WH2009> thou shalt conceive, <WH2029> and bear <WH3205> a son; <WH1121> and no <WH3808> razor <WH4177> shall come <WH5927> on <WH5921> his head: <WH7218> for <WH3588> the child <WH5288> shall be <WH1961> a Nazarite <WH5139> unto God <WH430> from <WH4480> the womb: <WH990> and he <WH1931> shall begin <WH2490> to deliver <WH3467> <WH853> Israel <WH3478> out of the hand <WH4480> <WH3027> of the Philistines. <WH6430>

Then the woman <WH802> came <WH935> and told <WH559> her husband, <WH376> saying, <WH559> A man <WH376> of God <WH430> came <WH935> unto <WH413> me, and his countenance <WH4758> was like the countenance <WH4758> of an angel <WH4397> of God, <WH430> very <WH3966> terrible: <WH3372> but I asked <WH7592> him not <WH3808> whence <WH335> <WH4480> <WH2088> he <WH1931> was, neither <WH3808> told <WH5046> he me his name: <WH8034>

But he said <WH559> unto me, Behold, <WH2009> thou shalt conceive, <WH2029> and bear <WH3205> a son; <WH1121> and now <WH6258> drink <WH8354> no <WH408> wine <WH3196> nor strong drink, <WH7941> neither <WH408> eat <WH398> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2932> thing: for <WH3588> the child <WH5288> shall be <WH1961> a Nazarite <WH5139> to God <WH430> from <WH4480> the womb <WH990> to <WH5704> the day <WH3117> of his death. <WH4194>

Then Manoah <WH4495> entreated <WH6279> <WH413> the LORD, <WH3068> and said, <WH559> O <WH994> my Lord, <WH136> let the man <WH376> of God <WH430> which <WH834> thou didst send <WH7971> come <WH935> again <WH5750> unto <WH413> us, and teach <WH3384> us what <WH4100> we shall do <WH6213> unto the child <WH5288> that shall be born. <WH3205>

And God <WH430> hearkened <WH8085> to the voice <WH6963> of Manoah; <WH4495> and the angel <WH4397> of God <WH430> came <WH935> again <WH5750> unto <WH413> the woman <WH802> as she <WH1931> sat <WH3427> in the field: <WH7704> but Manoah <WH4495> her husband <WH376> was not <WH369> with <WH5973> her.

And the woman <WH802> made haste, <WH4116> and ran, <WH7323> and showed <WH5046> her husband, <WH376> and said <WH559> unto <WH413> him, Behold, <WH2009> the man <WH376> hath appeared <WH7200> unto <WH413> me, that <WH834> came <WH935> unto <WH413> me the other day. <WH3117>

And Manoah <WH4495> arose, <WH6965> and went <WH1980> after <WH310> his wife, <WH802> and came <WH935> to <WH413> the man, <WH376> and said <WH559> unto him, Art thou <WH859> the man <WH376> that <WH834> spakest <WH1696> unto <WH413> the woman? <WH802> And he said, <WH559> I <WH589> am.
And Manoah <WH4495> said, <WH559> Now <WH6258> let thy words <WH1697> come to pass. <WH935> How <WH4100> shall we order <WH1961> <WH4941> the child, <WH5288> and how shall we do <WH4639> unto him?
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Manoah, <WH4495> Of all <WH4480> <WH3605> that <WH834> I said <WH559> unto <WH413> the woman <WH802> let her beware. <WH8104>

She may not <WH3808> eat <WH398> of any <WH4480> <WH3605> thing that <WH834> cometh <WH3318> of the vine, <WH4480> <WH1612> neither <WH408> let her drink <WH8354> wine <WH3196> or strong drink, <WH7941> nor <WH408> eat <WH398> any <WH3605> unclean <WH2932> thing: all <WH3605> that <WH834> I commanded <WH6680> her let her observe. <WH8104>

And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH3068> I pray thee, <WH4994> let us detain <WH6113> thee, until we shall have made ready <WH6213> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> for <WH6440> thee.

And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto <WH413> Manoah, <WH4495> Though <WH518> thou detain <WH6113> me, I will not <WH3808> eat <WH398> of thy bread: <WH3899> and if <WH518> thou wilt offer <WH6213> a burnt offering, <WH5930> thou must offer <WH5927> it unto the LORD. <WH3068> For <WH3588> Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> not <WH3808> that <WH3588> he <WH1931> was an angel <WH4397> of the LORD. <WH3068>

And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto <WH413> the angel <WH4397> of the LORD, <WH3068> What <WH4310> is thy name, <WH8034> that when <WH3588> thy sayings <WH1697> come to pass <WH935> we may do thee honor? <WH3513>
And the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> said <WH559> unto him, Why <WH4100> askest <WH7592> thou thus <WH2088> after my name, <WH8034> seeing it <WH1931> is secret? <WH6383>

So Manoah <WH4495> took <WH3947> <WH853> a kid <WH1423> <WH5795> with <WH854> a meat offering, <WH4503> and offered <WH5927> it upon <WH5921> a rock <WH6697> unto the LORD: <WH3068> and the angel did <WH6213> wondrously; <WH6381> and Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on. <WH7200>

For it came to pass, <WH1961> when the flame <WH3851> went up <WH5927> toward heaven <WH8064> from off <WH4480> <WH5921> the altar, <WH4196> that the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> ascended <WH5927> in the flame <WH3851> of the altar. <WH4196> And Manoah <WH4495> and his wife <WH802> looked on <WH7200> it, and fell <WH5307> on <WH5921> their faces <WH6440> to the ground. <WH776>

But the angel <WH4397> of the LORD <WH3068> did no <WH3808> more <WH3254> appear <WH7200> to <WH413> Manoah <WH4495> and to <WH413> his wife. <WH802> Then <WH227> Manoah <WH4495> knew <WH3045> that <WH3588> he <WH1931> was an angel <WH4397> of the LORD. <WH3068>
And Manoah <WH4495> said <WH559> unto <WH413> his wife, <WH802> We shall surely die, <WH4191> <WH4191> because <WH3588> we have seen <WH7200> God. <WH430>

But his wife <WH802> said <WH559> unto him, If <WH3863> the LORD <WH3068> were pleased <WH2654> to kill <WH4191> us, he would not <WH3808> have received <WH3947> a burnt offering <WH5930> and a meat offering <WH4503> at our hands, <WH4480> <WH3027> neither <WH3808> would he have showed <WH7200> us <WH853> all <WH3605> these <WH428> things, nor <WH3808> would as at this time <WH6256> have told <WH8085> us such things as these. <WH2063>
And the woman <WH802> bore <WH3205> a son, <WH1121> and called <WH7121> <WH853> his name <WH8034> Samson: <WH8123> and the child <WH5288> grew, <WH1431> and the LORD <WH3068> blessed <WH1288> him.
And the Spirit <WH7307> of the LORD <WH3068> began <WH2490> to move <WH6470> him at times in the camp <WH4264> of Dan <WH1835> between <WH996> Zorah <WH6881> and Eshtaol. <WH847>
